resources.string: Welcome to Race Planner training plan generator. Please choose one of the options below.\n\n This application is in ALPHA and with it comes frequent updates, crashes, and potential errors.

If you need to uninstall the app, it is highly recommended to delete all training plans first. If you do not do this, you will need to do it through google calendar, which could potentially take a long time.\n\n Thanks again for trying out my app and please send all feedback to raceplannerapp@gmail.com
Please enter a name for your training plan.
Please select the race you are training for.
Please select your current experience level.
Please select the date of your race.
Choose to create plan on dedicated calendar or your own.

Thanks again for trying out Race Planner. I hope it has provided you with an easy and effective tool for planning your training. I sure have had a great time building it. Again if you have any feedback, feel free to leave a review or send an email to raceplannerapp@gmail.com.

Happy running!
- Ryan
